family_oriented.reason: The attraction is family-friendly with interactive elements and a welcoming atmosphere for children.

history_oriented.reason: The museum aspect is more focused on pop culture than historical education.

activity_oriented.reason: The activities are limited to dining and viewing memorabilia.

nature_oriented.reason: The attraction lacks natural elements or scenic views.

food_oriented.reason: The focus is on creative and high-quality pizza offerings.

shopping_oriented.reason: There is no shopping component at this attraction.
